forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain this morning with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
